exclusion: Set the controller into Add/Remove mode, and press 3 clicks on "+" or "-" button on the panel to add/remove. If succeed, green LED flicks 4 times.
inclusion: Set the controller into Add/Remove mode, and press 3 clicks on "+" or "-" button on the panel to add/remove. If succeed, green LED flicks 4 times.
label: MH-DT411
overview: Dimmer Switch is a wall panel built-in with Z-Wave plus module. It supports basic command class, multi channel command class and multi channel association command class, also works as a repeater in a Z-Wave network.

category.label: Wall Switch
category.description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: Dimmer State Saved OR Not When Power Failure
Dimming Mode
parameters.description: 0: Leading Edge, 1: Trailing Edge 2: on/off only
parameters.overview: Dimming Mode

parameters.label: Auto Detection of Dimming Mode When Powered On
parameters.description: 0: Auto detection disabled, 1: Auto detection enabled, 2: Automatically dtects the load type once
parameters.overview: Auto Detection of Dimming Mode when Powered On

parameters.label: LED Backlit brightness level
parameters.overview: LED Backlit Brightness level

parameters.label: Minimum Brightness Level (%)
parameters.overview: Minimum Brightness Level

parameters.label: Maximum Brightness Level (%)
parameters.overview: Maximum Brightness Level percentage (2~99)

parameters.label: Single Dimming Step time (Manual)
parameters.overview: This parameter defines the time of single dimming step set in parameter 8 during the manual control. Manual control is performed through holding the push button

parameters.label: Single Dimming Step Size (Manual)
parameters.overview: This parameter defines the percentage value of dimming step during manual control. Manual control is performed through holding the push-button. NOTE: modification of this parameter is not recommended!

parameters.label: Single Dimming Step time (Auto)
parameters.overview: This parameter defines the time of single dimming step set in parameter A during the automatic control. Automatic control is performed through:- single push-button click, - double push button click, - Z-Wave control frames

parameters.label: Single Dimming Step Size (Auto)
parameters.overview: This parameter defines the percentage value of dimming step during the automatic control. Automatic control is performed through: - Single push-button click, - double push-button click, - Z-wave control frames

parameters.label: Dimming percentage when single touch of button (+ / -)
parameters.description: 0: The percentage get by the last button-holding touch. 1~99: Percentage value.
parameters.overview: With this parameter you can set the light level the lamp will reach when you turn on the lamp of single touch "+"

parameters.label: Reporting interval for dimming level
parameters.description: 0: No report during dimming send report in. 1-255: N*10ms interval
parameters.overview: This parameter sets the reporting interval of the dimming level by N*10ms

parameters.label: External Switch Type
parameters.overview: External Switch type, 0: Momentary button. 1: Toggle switch (2-state switches)

parameters.label: External Switch Input
parameters.description: 0: Function disabled. 1: Wire 1 ex.switch key to S1 only. 2: Wire 1 ex.switch key to S2 only. 3: Wire 2 ex.switch keys to S1 and S2, each key can control both dimming directions. 4: Wire 2 ex.switch keys to S1 and S2, each key control one dimming directio
parameters.overview: This parameter allows configuration of external switch type

parameters.label: Energy Meter Reporting
parameters.description: 0: Disabled. 1: Only report Watt. 2: Only report KWH. 3: Only report Watt & KWH. 4: Only report Ampere. 5: Only report Ampere & Watt. 6: Only report Ampere & KWH. 7: Only report Ampere & KWH & Watt. 8: Only report Voltage. 9: Only report Voltage & Watt. 1
parameters.overview: This parameter allows you to modify the Energy Meter report by choosing what information shall be reported

parameters.label: Energy Reporting Interval
parameters.overview: This parameter allows you to set the Energy Reporting Interval by 1-32768:n*1s

parameters.label: Beep
parameters.overview: This parameter enabled / disables the playing of a "beep" when one of the push-buttons ("+" or "-") is touched

parameters.label: Ampere Alarm Threshold
parameters.overview: This parameter allows the Ampere Alarm Threshold to be set or disabled

parameters.label: Instantaneous Consumption Alarm Threshold
parameters.overview: This parameter allows the Instantaneous Consumption Alarm to be set / disabled. The setting is in Watt (N*0.1W)

parameters.label: Overload Time before Load Off
parameters.description: 0: Disabled. 1-255: sec To protect the device not overload burned, it will be load off automatically, after load time detection Device will send Notification Command to gateway
parameters.overview: This parameter allows the time in seconds to be set before the Load off will occur and notification will be send to gateway

parameters.label: Auto Load Off When Overload
parameters.description: 0: Auto load off disabled. 1: Auto load off enabled
parameters.overview: This parameter enables/disables the Auto Load Off when overload function (default: disabled)

parameters.label: Detection Ampere of Overload
parameters.overview: This parameters reports the Ampere in case of Overload detection

parameters.label: Detection Voltage of Overload
parameters.overview: This parameter reports the Voltage in case of Overload Detection

parameters.label: Detection Power of Overload
parameters.overview: This parameter reports the Power value (W) in case of Overload Detection

parameters.label: Overload Time
parameters.overview: This parameter reports the time of the Overload detected

parameters.label: Factory Setting
parameters.overview: This parameter allows the device to be reset to factory defaults

associations.label: Meter report
associations.overview: The load instant power changes after dimming

associations.label: Multi-Level Switch class
associations.overview:
Trigger:

1. Press or hold momentary button on the device

2. Press or hold external button S1

3 Get dimming request from the gateway and complete dimming

associations.label: Notification
associations.overview:
trigger:

Load exceeds the threshold set by parameter 32-34

associations.label: Switch Multi Level
associations.overview:
trigger:

1. Long or short press internal button

2. Long or short press external button S1

3. Get dimming request from the gateway and complete dimming

associations.label: Basic V2
associations.overview:
trigger:

1. Short press internal button to open load

2. Short press external button S1 to open load

associations.label: Basic V2
associations.overview:
trigger:

1. Short press internal button to close load

2. Short press external button S1 to close load
